section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: The initial statement defines the Venture's purpose as IT Development related to medical services. However, the subsequent sentence grants BorrowMoney.com, inc. unilateral discretion to change this purpose at any time. This creates a contradiction: while the agreement initially defines a specific purpose, that purpose can be altered at will by one member, potentially negating the initial agreement on the Venture's focus.

section: Any vote required by the Members will be determined such that each Member receives one vote, however, BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote will carry twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote.
explanation: This section establishes a voting structure where BorrowMoney.com, inc. has twice the voting power of JVLS, LLC. This contradicts the principle of equal partnership implied in a joint venture agreement. While not inherently illegal, it creates an imbalance of power that could lead to disputes and undermines the collaborative nature typically associated with joint ventures. The discrepancy arises because the initial premise of a joint venture suggests shared control and decision-making, which this clause directly contradicts.

section: This Agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc., notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.
explanation: This section allows BorrowMoney.com, inc. to unilaterally amend the agreement, regardless of JVLS, LLC's objections. This contradicts the basic principle of mutual consent in contract law. A valid contract requires both parties to agree to its terms and any modifications thereof. This clause gives BorrowMoney.com, inc. the power to change the agreement without JVLS, LLC's consent, essentially negating the latter's contractual rights.
